competition_summary.context: competition and if we are unable to compete effectively, we may experience decreased demand and decreased market share.  Even if we compete effectively, we may be required to reduce the prices we charge. • Our growth depends on the timely development and commercialization, and customer acceptance, of new and enhanced products and services based on technological innovation.  Our growth can also suffer if the markets into which we sell our products and services decline, do not grow as anticipated
